docs.title: The Python Framework for AI & Data Artisans
docs.text:
Arkalos name comes from combination of Arc and Greek Kalos, together meaning a beatiful journey through the data.

Are you tired of reading bad documentation? Are you tired of searching for most basic things for hours and days? Are you tired of following the instructions and still nothing works?

NodeJS example *some NodeJS code here...* RoR example *some Ruby on Rails code here...* macOS and LinuxWindows 
$ curl -LsSf https://astral.sh/uv/install.sh | sh

$ powershell -c "irm https://astral.sh/uv/install.ps1 | iex"
🚀 Modern Python Workflow

Arkalos comes with modern Python practices, libraries, and a package manager, making it easy for both non-coders and AI engineers to get started.

🛠️ Hassle-Free Setup

No more struggling with environment setup, package installations, or import issues. Get started instantly.

📊 Built-in Data Warehouse

Seamlessly connect Notion, Airtable, Google Drive, and more. Comes with SQLite as a local, lightweight data warehouse.

🤖 AI & LLM Ready

Train AI models, run LLMs, and build AI pipelines locally without complex setups. Fully open-source and compliant.

🔗 Seamless Microservices

Deploy Arkalos as a Python microservice and integrate it into existing apps and platforms effortlessly.

📓 Jupyter Notebook Friendly

Start with a Jupyter Notebook and smoothly transition to scripts, full AI apps, or microservices as your workflow grows.

🤝 Collaboration Made Easy

Share your code across devices or with a team effortlessly. Version control, data sync, and remote access built-in.

🔒 Data Privacy First

Keep your data secure. Run everything locally with full control—no need to send sensitive data to third parties.

⚖️ Legal & Compliance

Fully open-source, compliant with GDPR & other regulations. Ideal for individuals & businesses needing data governance.

📖 Beautiful Documentation

Well-structured, easy-to-follow documentation makes extending and customizing Arkalos a breeze.

docs.title: Moden Python Workflow Ready Out-of-the-Box
docs.text:
Arkalos uses modern Python practices, libraries and a package manager.

And makes it easy to get started for both non-coders and scientists and AI artisans and engineers.

No more struggling with:

  • Configuring local environment
  • Installing manually tens of packages and figuring out how to use them
  • Importing tens of packages and writing too much code just to do basic stuff
  • Resolving import and code issues and errors
  • Figuring out how to write custom code and modules and where to put them
  • Growing your workflow from a simple Jupyter Notebook into a Script to an entire App and a full AI pipeline
  • Connecting various data sources and building a simple data warehouse
  • Training own AI models and running LLMs, pipelines and agents locally
  • And collaborating with the team, or just sharing the code across your own devices

docs.title: Data Warehouse and integrating various sources
docs.text:
Data Warehouses are centralized super data repositories used to connect many data sources and enable AI and analytics.

Any AI workflow, from simple automation to RAG, requires a business or organization to have at least a simple data warehouse first.

Data warehouses don't have to be complicated and large. Not every case requires a Snowflake or BigQuery.

Individual developers and business can have their own data warehouse out-of-the-box locally!

In Arkalos, common data sources and connectors like Notion, Airtable, Google Drive and HubSpot are available out of the box.

config/data_sources.py
    'airtable': {
        'enabled': True,
        'api_key': env('AIRTABLE_API_KEY'),
        'base_id': env('AIRTABLE_BASE_ID'),
        'tables': env('AIRTABLE_TABLES'),
    }

And let Arkalos

SQLite, a simple file-based DB, is used as a default data warehouse on your local computer.

arkalos dwh sync

And that's it. All data from specific tables will automatically be imported into your own data warehouse.

And ready for advanced analysis or AI pipelines without the need to download data manually every time.

Works even offline after data is in your data warehouse!

docs.title: Launch a Python Data or AI Microservice
docs.text:
Python is the world's fastest growing programming language due to it's rich math, stats, scientific, data, AI and LLM libraries and a global community.

More and more organizations are looking to enable data and AI capabilities

Freelancers, consultants, startups, micro businesses and large organizations and governments who need to enable powerful data and AI capabilities into their existing products, platforms and apps can simply launch Arkalos as a microservice and integrate it into their architecture, seamlessly.
